settings.content: Brooklyn is a tailor-made theme for the modern apparel store. Features include a mobile-first responsive design, unique typography, an edge-to-edge homepage hero, a dynamic product grid, and product pages with at-a-glance availability for each size.

This theme is fully supported by Shopify. For support and customizations, read the [theme documentation](https://docs.shopify.com/manual/more/official-shopify-themes/brooklyn) or contact [theme-support@shopify.com](mailto:theme-support@shopify.com?subject=[Brooklyn]+Theme+Support).

settings.label: Italicize titles, blockquotes, drop-down links, comment author name, and dates.
Inverted logo
settings.info: Use this with dark slideshow images for better visibility

settings.content: Choose your home page sections and their order.
Each section can only be used once on the home page.
Turn the hero slideshow on and off from the home page section.
Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.
By selecting the Show Decimal Places checkbox, the prices will be diplayed with values after decimal place. Else, they will be replaced by zero.

settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.label: Currencies you wish to support

settings.content: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.
